column1: 253317,Intensive Care Specialist,,"Perform emergency medical procedures which are complex, intensive or critical
column5: Inform medical professionals regarding patient conditions and care
column9: Refer patients to other health care practitioners or health resources
column19: Provide health and wellness advice to patients, program participants or caregivers
column21: Explain medical procedures or test results to patients or family members
column25: Monitor patient progress or responses to treatments
column27: Collect medical information from patients, family members or other medical professionals
column29: Analyse test results to inform diagnosis or treatment
column31: Order medical diagnostic or clinical tests
column39: Collaborate with health care professionals to plan or provide treatment
column43: Prepare reports summarising patient diagnostic or care activities
column45: Advise others on health care issues
column47: Treat acute illnesses, infections or injuries
column53: Conduct research to increase knowledge about medical issues
column55: Prepare official health documents or records",0.0831833091147216
